API Reference
=============

This section contains the API documentation for the HABIT package, automatically generated from the source code docstrings.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   habit.core
   habit.utils

Main Modules
------------

* :mod:`habit.core`: Core logic for habitat analysis and modeling.
* :mod:`habit.utils`: Utility functions for imaging, I/O, and visualization.
* :mod:`habit.cli`: Command-line interface implementation.
